module.name: HTML
module.param:
Subnet Affinity Problems

Occasionally, a server will appear from an IP address that is not associated with a site. This page provides a concise report for handling this case. When you see an IP address in this page, log on to your Forest Infrastructure Master and use the Active Directory Sites and Services to add the subnet and associate it with a Site. IP addresses that report more frequently are closer to the top of the list.

module.name: Search
module.param: eventtype=msad-subnet-affinity|stats count by host,src_domain,src_host,src_ip|sort -count|table host,src_domain,src_host,src_ip|rename host as "Reporting Host", src_domain as "Reporting Domain", src_host as "Problem Host", src_ip as "Problem IP"
